title: Productivity Focus Routine
description: A structured workday routine using the Pomodoro technique and focus blocks to maximize productivity.

setupSteps.prompt: What time do you start your work day? (e.g., 09:00)
What time do you usually have lunch? (e.g., 12:30)
What time do you finish work? (e.g., 17:00)
